attributes.action: Sack Alison Saunders. Repeated CPS failings have damaged justice and victims.
attributes.background: The repeated failures by the CPS in sexual offences has meant innocent men put through hell for months. It has undermined public confidence in the justice system which will deter victims making complaints, encourage juries to acquit and innocent men to be wrongly charged thus affecting all sides.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for someone to be sacked.
